00041 #include "pizBoundedHashTable.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 
00048 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_HASH_SIZE   157
00052 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE   128
00053 
00054 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 
00057 PIZBoundedHashTable *pizBoundedHashTableNew (long argc, long *argv)
00058 {
00059     PIZBoundedHashTable *x = NULL;
00060         
00061     if (x = (PIZBoundedHashTable *)malloc (sizeof(PIZBoundedHashTable))) {
00062         x->flags    = PIZ_BOUNDED_HASHTABLE_FLAG_NONE;
00063         x->count    = 0;
00064         x->hashSize = PIZ_DEFAULT_HASH_SIZE;
00065         x->poolSize = PIZ_DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE;
00066         
00067         if (argc && argv[0] > 0) {
00068             x->hashSize = argv[0];
00069         }
00070         
00071         if ((argc > 1) && argv[1] > 0) {
00072             x->poolSize = argv[1];
00073         }
00074         
00075         x->ticketMachine = pizBoundedStackNew (x->poolSize);
00076         
00077         x->pool = (PIZBoundedHashTableElement *)malloc (x->poolSize * sizeof(PIZBoundedHashTableElement));
00078         x->hashTable = (PIZGrowingArray **)calloc (x->hashSize, sizeof(PIZGrowingArray *));
00079         
00080         if (x->ticketMachine && x->pool && x->hashTable) {
00081             long j;
00082                     
00083             for (j = (x->poolSize - 1); j >= 0; j--) {
00084                 pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, j);
00085             }
00086         } else {
00087             pizBoundedHashTableFree (x);
00088             x = NULL;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     
00092     return x;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void pizBoundedHashTableSetFlags (PIZBoundedHashTable *x, long flags)
00096 {
00097     x->flags = flags;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void pizBoundedHashTableFree (PIZBoundedHashTable *x)
00101 {
00102     if (x) {
00103         pizBoundedStackFree (x->ticketMachine);
00104         
00105         if (x->pool) {
00106             free (x->pool);
00107             x->pool = NULL;
00108         }
00109             
00110         if (x->hashTable) {
00111             long i;
00112     
00113             for (i = 0; i < x->hashSize; i++) {
00114                 pizGrowingArrayFree (x->hashTable[i]);
00115             }
00116     
00117             free (x->hashTable);
00118             x->hashTable = NULL;
00119         }
00120         
00121         free (x);
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 
00128 void pizBoundedHashTableClear (PIZBoundedHashTable *x)
00129 {
00130     long i;
00131     
00132     pizBoundedStackClear (x->ticketMachine);
00133     
00134     for (i = (x->poolSize - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00135         pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00136     }
00137     
00138     for (i = 0; i < x->hashSize; i++) {
00139         if (x->hashTable[i]) {
00140             pizGrowingArrayClear (x->hashTable[i]);
00141         }
00142     }
00143     
00144     x->count = 0;
00145 }
00146 
00147 PIZError pizBoundedHashTableAdd (PIZBoundedHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr)
00148 {
00149     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00150     
00151     if (ptr && (key >= 0)) {
00152         long p = key % x->hashSize;
00153                     
00154         if (!x->hashTable[p]) {
00155             x->hashTable[p] = pizGrowingArrayNew (0);
00156         }
00157         
00158         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00159             if (!pizBoundedStackPop (x->ticketMachine)) {
00160                 long index = pizBoundedStackPoppedValue (x->ticketMachine);
00161 
00162                 err = PIZ_GOOD;
00163                 err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend (x->hashTable[p], index);
00164             
00165                 if (!err) {                           
00166                     x->pool[index].key = key;
00167                     x->pool[index].ptr = ptr;
00168                         
00169                     x->count ++;
00170                 } else {
00171                     pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, index);
00172                 }
00173             }
00174         } else {
00175             err |= PIZ_MEMORY;
00176         }
00177     }
00178     
00179     return err;
00180 }
00181 
00182 PIZError pizBoundedHashTableRemoveByKeyAndPtr (PIZBoundedHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr)
00183 {
00184     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00185     
00186     if (ptr && (key >= 0)) {
00187         long p = key % x->hashSize;
00188         
00189         if (x->hashTable[p]) {   
00190             long count, i, index;
00191             
00192             if (count = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->hashTable[p])) {
00193                 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00194                     index = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], i);
00195                     
00196                     if ((x->pool[index].key == key) && (x->pool[index].ptr == ptr)) {
00197                         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00198                         
00199                         pizGrowingArrayRemoveIndex (x->hashTable[p], i);
00200                         pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, index);
00201                             
00202                         break;
00203                     }
00204                 }
00205             }
00206         }
00207     }
00208     
00209     return err;
00210 }
00211 
00212 long pizBoundedHashTableCount (const PIZBoundedHashTable *x)
00213 {
00214     return (x->count);
00215 }
00216 
00217 PIZError pizBoundedHashTablePtrByKey (const PIZBoundedHashTable *x, long key, void **ptr)
00218 {
00219     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00220     
00221     if (*ptr) {
00222         (*ptr) = NULL;
00223     }
00224     
00225     if (key >= 0) {
00226         long p = key % x->hashSize;
00227         
00228         if (x->hashTable[p]) {   
00229             long count, i, index;
00230             
00231             if (count = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->hashTable[p])) {
00232                 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00233                     index = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], i);
00234                     
00235                     if (x->pool[index].key == key) {
00236                         (*ptr) = x->pool[index].ptr;
00237                         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00238                         break;
00239                     }
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         }
00243     }
00244 
00245     return err;
00246 }
00247 
00248 bool pizBoundedHashTableContainsKey (const PIZBoundedHashTable *x, long key)
00249 {
00250     bool k = false;
00251     
00252     if (key >= 0) {
00253         long p = key % x->hashSize;
00254         
00255         if (x->hashTable[p]) {
00256             long count, i, index;
00257             
00258             if (count = pizGrowingArrayCount (x->hashTable[p])) {
00259                 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00260                     index = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->hashTable[p], i);
00261                     
00262                     if (x->pool[index].key == key) {
00263                         k = true;
00264                         break;
00265                     }
00266                 }
00267             }
00268         }
00269     }
00270     
00271     return k;
00272 }
